CustomField.formula: TEXT( DAY( DATEVALUE (Timestamp2__c) ) ) & " " & CASE(MONTH( DATEVALUE (Timestamp2__c)), 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", 12, "Dec", "None") & " " & TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE (Timestamp2__c) ) ) & " " & TEXT(TIMEVALUE(Timestamp2__c))
CustomField.label: Timestamp2 String
